definitions.vibration: Oscillatory motion measured in mm/s (Velocity). ISO 10816 Zone B limit is typically < 2.5 mm/s. > 4.5 mm/s is Critical.
definitions.temperature: Bearing metal temperature. Warning at 65°C, Critical at 75°C (Babbitt softening point).
definitions.clearance: Labyrinth or seal clearance. Increase indicates efficiency loss. > 0.50mm usually requires renewal.
definitions.efficiency: Ratio of electrical output to hydraulic input. Dropping efficiency suggests seal wear or blade erosion.
definitions.cavitation: Implosion of vapor bubbles. Causes 'pitting' noise (gravel sound). Scale 1-5 where 5 is deafening noise.
definitions.alignment: Shaft concentricity. Misalignment causes 1xRPM vibration and bearing heat.
definitions.axial_thrust: Downward hydraulic force. Supported by thrust bearing. Changes indicate seal wear.
definitions.oil_film: 10-50 micron wedge supporting the shaft. Loss = immediate failure.
definitions.grid_frequency: System frequency (50/60Hz). Speed governor control target.
definitions.soft_foot: Frame distortion due to uneven mounting.
definitions.tan: Total Acid Number (mg KOH/g). Measure of oil oxidation. > 0.5 is critical.
definitions.water_in_oil: Presence of water emulsion. Reduces load capacity. > 500ppm is warning.
definitions.spiral_pressure: Inlet pressure to the turbine distributor. Static vs Dynamic head.
definitions.head_cover_pressure: Pressure above the runner. Vacuum indicates good draft tube action. High pressure = seal blow-by.
definitions.combinator: Kaplan cam relationship between Guide Vane opening and Blade Angle.
definitions.servo_time: Time (s) for full stroke of servomotor. Too slow = pump issues; Too fast = water hammer risk.
definitions.deflector_gap: Clearance between jet and deflector. Must be small enough to cut jet instantly on load rejection.
definitions.accumulator_pressure: Hydraulic pressure in governor accumulators. Drop indicates N2 leak or pump failure. Standard: 40-63 bar.
definitions.pump_run_time: Duty cycle of governor oil pumps. Frequent starts (>6/hr) indicate internal system leakage.
definitions.gate_opening: Guide Vane or Needle opening %. Compare with power output to verify efficiency curve.
definitions.delta_t: Temperature difference (Inlet - Outlet). Low Delta T (<2°C) often means fouled heat exchangers.
definitions.cooling_pressure: Raw water pressure. Low pressure risks loss of cooling flow. Check strainers.
definitions.filter_dp: Differential Pressure across filters. High DP (>0.5 bar) signals clogging.
definitions.water_level: Elevation in meters above sea level (m nm). Critical for calculating Gross Head.
definitions.winding_temp: Stator winding temperature. Class F limit 155°C, but operational alarm usually 120°C.
definitions.sump_level: Oil level in bearing sump. Low level risks pump cavitation and aeration.
definitions.tip_clearance: Gap between Kaplan blade tip and discharge ring. Critical for cavitation performance.
definitions.deflector_time: Time for deflector to cut jet (ms). Slow response risks overspeed during load rejection.
definitions.nozzle_leak: Leakage flow when needle is fully closed. Indicates seat erosion or actuator offset.

maintenance.labyrinth: Gap > 0.50mm: Plan seal ring replacement. Efficiency loss approx 1% per 0.2mm gap increase.
maintenance.tip_clearance: Gap > 2mm: Cavitation risk high. Check blade trunnion bushings.
maintenance.deflector_time: Time > 800ms: DANGER. Check hydraulic pressure and pilot valve.
maintenance.nozzle_leak: Leak > 5%: Replace needle tip and seat. Inspect actuator seal.
maintenance.babbitt: Temp > 75°C: STOP immediately. Inspect oil cooler and flow. Check for wiping.
maintenance.winding: Temp > 120°C: Check air gap cooling and overload condition. Inspect coolers.
maintenance.governor: Pump starts > 10/hr: Leakage high. Re-charge accumulators or reseal unloader valve.
maintenance.cooling: Delta T < 2°C: Heat exchanger fouling likely. Backflush or dismantle for cleaning.
maintenance.filter: DP > 0.5 bar: Switch over duplex filter and clean basket immediately.
maintenance.shaftLift: Float > 0.35mm: Thrust bearing pads worn or loose. Inspect axial bumpers.
maintenance.oilTan: TAN > 0.5: Chemical degradation. scheduling oil change. Varnish potential high.
maintenance.waterInOil: Water > 0.1%: Centrifuge immediately or replace charge. Check cooler leaks.
maintenance.vibration: Vib > 4.5 mm/s: Check alignment and balance. Inspect holding down bolts.
maintenance.cavitation: Noise Level 4-5: Inject air if available. CHECK TAILWATER LEVEL. Inspect runner at next stop.
maintenance.bladeSync: Mismatch > 2%: Recalibrate cam curve (Combinator). Efficiency penalty high.
maintenance.hubLeak: Leakage detected: Environmental risk. Plan for head cover hub seal replacement.
maintenance.needleTip: Erosion Scale 4-5: Jet dispersion causing efficiency loss. Replace needle tip and seat.
maintenance.deflector: Gap out of spec: SAFETY CRITICAL. Adjust linkage length immediately.
maintenance.observations: Abnormal sensory input requires immediate investigation by lead engineer.
